Posts.EditableText:
With each new version of Quest, new features are added. Unfortunately, the translations frequently do not get updated, and so lag behind. Hopefully Quest 5.8 will be out soonish, and it would be great to get translations up to date.

SoonGames has done German. baskham has pretty much done Danish. Can anyone else offer any help?

If you can, please get in contact. Each language has its own bits missing, and if you can tell me where you can help, I can tell you what we need.
Posts.HTML:
With each new version of Quest, new features are added. Unfortunately, the translations frequently do not get updated, and so lag behind. Hopefully Quest 5.8 will be out soonish, and it would be great to get translations up to date.

SoonGames has done German. baskham has pretty much done Danish. Can anyone else offer any help?

If you can, please get in contact. Each language has its own bits missing, and if you can tell me where you can help, I can tell you what we need.

Posts.EditableText: Just bumping this to see if we can get other other translations up to date. German, Danish, Spanish and Greek are all done, but it would be great if we could get the others done too.
Posts.HTML: Just bumping this to see if we can get other other translations up to date. German, Danish, Spanish and Greek are all done, but it would be great if we could get the others done too.

Posts.EditableText: Maybe I can do something for Italian translation.
Posts.HTML: Maybe I can do something for Italian translation.
